data.title: Councillors
data.meta_description: Information about Herstmonceux Parish Councillors, our Wealden District Council representatives, our East Sussex County Councillor and our Member of Parliment can be found here.
data.text:
Herstmonceux Parish Council covers the Civil Parish of Herstmonceux. There are 11 members, elections are held every 4 years. The Council consists of 8 Councillors for Castle Ward (BWEH), 2 Councillors for Trolliloes Ward (BWED) and 1 for Cowbeech Ward (BAEL).

Declarations of Member's Interests are made at the beginning of their Council Term, or beginning of their Co-option Term, and can be found here on the Wealden website. Further declarations specific to Agenda Items are made at the start of any given meeting.

Contact Details Contact details of Parish Councillors, District Councillors and Parish Council staff can be found in this document

The Parish Council holds an Open Office, open to the public, on Thursdays between 10.00am and 1.00pm

To contact the Clerk or a member of the Parish Council please email Clerk@HerstmonceuxParish.org.uk

Or Write to: The Clerk, Parish Office, 4 Gardner Street, Herstmonceux, BN27 4LG

Telephone: 01323 833312
